topics.body: I'm building a mansion in Sims 3. Anybody with some experience in that type of thing have any tips?

topics.body: Which type of family/sims will inhabit it?

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/532604d66368722ab1b60000#post_532604d66368722ab1b60000


Make it huge, like Acres huge. Then place the baby in the farthest corner and leave him there. Then make all the family to stay each one in one room of the house and lock them in and watch them go mad one by one. The last two are placed on the same room with only one can of food

The last survivor stays with the house only to find it has been demolished and he is homeless now.

topics.body:
Awww yeah. Time to use this thread to complain about pointless stuff that only mildly irritates me. Yee.

Being a guy with no life that runs an ask blog for fun, I've noticed that some other blogs can get up to a 180 followers in a week, even if their layout is bad, and they have all of 3 posts. I try to update once a week at least. And with a picture that has some effort put into it. Still don't even make a fraction of the followers some other blogs with only text posts and maybe one picture do.

Da heck am I doing wrong here?
topics.author: 500757fd7f123b75a90003b1

topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/532631a8636872551d810100#post_532631a8636872551d810100
Let's play the "why aren't you tumblr popular game"!

Question 1)Do you throw a shitfit every time a person unfollows you?
If you answered, "No I have dignity as a human being and won't do such a thing" then no you're not popular.
Question 2)Do you constantly beg followers for money and make up stories about having diseases and/or being homeless in a vain attempt to get money from people?
If you answered, "No I have dignity as a human being and won't do such a thing" then no you're not popular.
In fact if at any point in these questions you respond with, "I have some level of self respect and dignity as a human being" then no you aren't tumblr famous.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
